items.description: The dataset is time-stamped and contains raw data from all the sensors, calibration values, pose trajectory, ground truth pose, and 3D maps. The data is Robot Operating System (ROS) compatible.
items.title: Ford Dataset

items.description: The dataset features 2D semantic segmentation, 3D point clouds, 3D bounding boxes, and vehicle bus data.
items.title: Audi A2D2 Dataset

items.description: The dataset contains independently-generated labels for lidar and camera data, not simply projections.
items.title: Waymo Open Dataset

items.description: The Oxford RobotCar Dataset contains over 100 repetitions of a consistent route through Oxford, UK, captured over a period of over a year.
items.title: Oxford RobotCar

items.description: This dataset was collected with our robocar (in human driving mode of course), equipped up to eleven heterogeneous sensors, in the downtown (for long-term data) and a suburb (for roundabout data) of MontbÃ©liard in France. The vehicle speed was limited to 50 km/h following the French traffic rules.
items.title: EU Long-term Dataset

items.description: Public large-scale dataset for autonomous driving.
items.title: NuScenes

items.description: Public dataset collected by a fleet of Ford Fusion vehicles equipped with LIDAR and camera.
items.title: Lyft

items.description: Widespread public dataset, pirmarily focusing on computer vision applications, but also contains LIDAR point cloud.
items.title: KITTI

items.description: Dataset for semantic and panoptic scene segmentation.
items.title: Semantic KITTI

items.description: Public large-scale dataset for autonomous driving in adverse weather conditions (snowy weather).
items.title: CADC - Canadian Adverse Driving Conditions Dataset

items.description: University of Toronto, aUToronto's self-driving car dataset, which contains GPS/IMU, 3D LIDAR, and Monocular camera data. It can be used for 3D pedestrian detection.
items.title: UofTPed50 Dataset

items.description: Public large-scale dataset for autonomous driving provided by Hesai & Scale. It enables researchers to study challenging urban driving situations using the full sensor suit of a real self-driving-car.
items.title: PandaSet Open Dataset

items.description: A public datatset from non-uniform distribution of LIDAR scanning patterns with emphasis on long range. In this dataset Luminar Hydra LIDAR is used. The dataset is available at the Volvo Cars Innovation Portal.
items.title: Cirrus dataset

items.description: Long-term, large-scale dataset collected over the period of 1.5 years on a weekly basis over the University of Sydney campus and surrounds. It includes multiple sensor modalities and covers various environmental conditions. ROS compatible
items.title: USyd Dataset- The Univerisity of Sydney Campus- Dataset

items.description: Navigation and localisation dataset for self driving cars and autonomous robots in Brno, Czechia.
items.title: Brno Urban Dataset

items.description: A dataset designed to support autonomous vehicle perception tasks including 3D tracking and motion forecasting collected in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania and Miami, Florida, USA.
items.title: Argoverse

items.description: The Boreas dataset was collected by driving a repeated route over the course of 1 year resulting in stark seasonal variations. In total, Boreas contains over 350km of driving data including several sequences with adverse weather conditions such as rain and heavy snow. The Boreas data-taking platform features a unique high-quality sensor suite with a 128-channel Velodyne Alpha Prime lidar, a 360-degree Navtech radar, and accurate ground truth poses obtained from an Applanix POSLV GPS/IMU.
items.title: Boreas Dataset
